snippet.title: ELDEN RING Reforged v0.5.0 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download this free ELDEN RING mod at Elden Ring Nexus: https://www.nexusmods.com/eldenring/mods/541
Join the ELDEN RING Reforged Discord: https://discord.gg/pTkPMSdfKm
View the wiki: https://err.fandom.com

A thorough revision of ELDEN RING's balance and mechanics. Covers enemies, boss fights, hitboxes, animations, equipment, the camera, and more. Includes unique camera parameters for boss fights, improved enemy hitboxes, and new gameplay mechanics that fix many of the issues plaguing the game.

ELDEN RING Reforged is being developed for free as a passion project. You can show your support for the creator here: https://ko-fi.com/kirnifr

Music: "Dragon Castle" by Makai Symphony: http://makai-symphony.com/
